attributes.action: Keep the Staffordshire Bull Terrier OFF the Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to support keeping Staffordshire Bull Terriers OFF the dangerous dogs act.

Staffordshire Bull Terriers aka the Nanny Dog are not a dangerous breed.
They are a loyal and loving dog who has unfortunatly fallen into popularity for the wrong reasons.

When owned by RESPONSIBLE owners they are perfectly well socialised and trained and are not a threat to the public.

Signing this petition will show your support to keep Staffordshire Bull Terriers OFF the Dangerous Dogs Act
